original_title: Πολυξένη: Μια Ιστορία Από Την Πόλη
overview: In 1955 a couple of prominent Greek Istanbulites adopt an orphan Greek girl, twelve-year-old Polyxeni, who is separated from her younger brother. She embarks on a new life and a future that looks bright, but she will have to defend what’s rightfully hers.
title: Polyxeni
